questions.name: Sessions Over Time
questions.query: SELECT date_key, session_count FROM marts.agg_daily_summary ORDER BY date_key

questions.name: Average Session Duration
questions.query: SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) as avg_duration FROM marts.dim_sessions

questions.name: Active Hours Heatmap
questions.description: Activity by hour and day of week
questions.query: SELECT hour_of_day, day_name, total_activity FROM marts.agg_hourly_activity

questions.name: Tool Usage Distribution
questions.description: Breakdown of tool usage by name
questions.query: SELECT tool_name, total_calls FROM marts.agg_tool_efficiency ORDER BY total_calls DESC

questions.name: Tool Category Breakdown
questions.query: SELECT tool_category, SUM(total_calls) as calls FROM marts.agg_tool_efficiency GROUP BY tool_category ORDER BY calls DESC

questions.name: Top 10 Most Used Tools
questions.description: Ranked list of most frequently used tools
questions.query: SELECT tool_name, total_calls, sessions_used FROM marts.agg_tool_efficiency ORDER BY popularity_rank LIMIT 10

questions.name: Project Activity Ranking
questions.query: SELECT project_id, total_messages, session_count FROM marts.dim_projects ORDER BY total_messages DESC LIMIT 15

questions.name: Project Status Distribution
questions.query: SELECT activity_status, COUNT(*) as project_count FROM marts.dim_projects GROUP BY activity_status

questions.name: Daily Code Changes
questions.query: SELECT date_key, file_reads, file_writes, file_edits FROM marts.agg_daily_summary WHERE has_activity = true ORDER BY date_key

questions.name: File Types Worked On
questions.description: Distribution of file types by operations
questions.query: SELECT aggregation_key as file_type, total_operations FROM marts.agg_code_changes WHERE aggregation_level = 'by_file_type' ORDER BY total_operations DESC

questions.name: Task Category Distribution
questions.description: Classification of work by task type
questions.query: SELECT task_category, COUNT(*) as count FROM marts.fct_messages GROUP BY task_category ORDER BY count DESC

questions.name: Response Time Trends
questions.query: SELECT date_key, AVG(avg_response_time_seconds) as avg_response FROM marts.dim_sessions GROUP BY date_key ORDER BY date_key

dashboards.name: Developer Productivity
dashboards.description: Session duration, activity patterns, and productivity metrics

dashboards.name: AI Interaction Patterns
dashboards.description: Tool usage, efficiency, and interaction analysis

dashboards.name: Project Insights
dashboards.description: Project activity, code changes, and file operations
